VIEWS_SPEC.VIEW_TEXT:
("RESPONSE_ID","CHANNEL_ID","CHANNEL_NAME","RESPONSE_DATE","SOURCE_ID","TITLE_SUBJECT","RESPONSE_BODY","ATTACHMENTS","ACTIVE","PROCESSED","SUBS_RESPONSE_ID","SUBSCRIPTION_ID","CHANNEL_RESPONSE_ID","USER_ID","PID","REVIEWED","FOLLOW_UP","BODY","FEED_DATA_ID","PROCESSED_FLAG","ATTACHMENT","EMAIL_BODY","RECIPIENT","SENDER","SERVER","CREATION_DATE") AS select Ch_Resp_Dtls.Response_Id, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Channel_Id, MS_RGA_UTILITIES.GET_CHANNEL_NAME(Ch_Resp_Dtls.CHANNEL_ID) AS CHANNEL_NAME, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Response_Date as RESPONSE_DATE, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Source_Id, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Title_Subject, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Response_Body, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Attachments, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Active, CH_RESP_DTLS.PROCESSED, --Ch_Resp_Dtls.Feed_Data_Id,
Sub_Resp.Subs_Response_Id, Sub_Resp.Subscription_Id, Sub_Resp.Channel_Response_Id, Sub_Resp.USER_ID, Sub_Resp.Pid, Sub_Resp.Reviewed , Sub_Resp.Follow_Up ,
FEEDS.body , Feeds.Feed_Data_Id, Feeds.Processed_Flag, '''' || Feeds.Attachment || ''', 10' AS Attachment, Feeds.Body email_body, Feeds.Recipient, Feeds.Sender, FEEDS.SERVER, FEEDS.CREATION_DATE From Ms_Rga_Channel_Response_Dtls Ch_Resp_Dtls, MS_RGA_SUBSCRIPTION_RESPONSE SUB_RESP, MS_RGA_FEED_AGG_FILTERED_V FEEDS WHERE Ch_Resp_Dtls.Response_Id = Sub_Resp.Channel_Response_Id AND SUB_RESP.PID = FEEDS.FEED_DATA_ID
